text: aur ek din ittiphaaqan moosa shahar mein aise vakt aae ki vahaan ke log (neend kee) gaphalat mein pade hue the to dekha ki vahaan do aadamee aapas mein lade marate hain ye (ek) to unakee qaum (banee isarail) mein ka hai aur vah (doosara) unake dushman kee qaum (qibtee) ka hai to jo shakhs unakee qaum ka tha usane us shakhs se jo unake dushmanon mein tha (galaba haasil karane ke lie) moosa se madad maangee ye sunate hee moosa ne use ek ghoosa maara tha ki usaka kaam tamaam ho gaya phir (khyaal karake) kahane lage ye shaitaan ka kaam tha isamen shak nahin ki vah dushman aur khullam khulla gumaraah karane vaala hai
